Description:
Stunning family retreat in a prime pocket.
Incredibly placed at the end of a peaceful court and backing onto the picturesque Hoskins Ridge Nature Reserve, this exquisitely presented family focused home will wow you with its open living zones, modern tones and intricate split-level design.
Beautifully landscaped front gardens and lawns are the pre-cursor to a wide open entrance of cooling stone tiles and a towering cathedral style ceiling which houses a spacious living/dining area flooded with natural light.
Move past the separate study/4th bedroom and through to a brilliant open plan living, dining and stunning kitchen area that has plenty of room for the furniture, air-conditioning for comfort and connection to both the outdoors and a huge 5th bed, play or theatre room option.
Incorporating Miele stainless steel appliances including a built-in gas cooktop, rangehood, wall-mounted oven and integrated dishwasher, a double pantry, custom breakfast bar and plenty of storage, the kitchen really forms the central hub of a flowing floorplan.
An incredible hotel style master bedroom has split-system air-conditioning, a walk-in robe and a bright ensuite, whilst additional bedrooms with robes are housed on a step up level and separated by an updated bathroom with corner shower and inset bath.
Built to entertain, a meticulously kept rear yard enjoys a huge multi-layered entertaining area with built-in gas barbecue, abundant garden beds and plenty of grass for the kids and pets to explore. There's also access to under house storage, gated access to the front and a secure gate out to the amazing reserve.
Additional split-system air-conditioning, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, a feature fireplace and a double garage with in-built storage further contribute to a one-of-a-kind property in a sensational location.
Close to Yarra Road and Croydon Hills primary schools, with proximity to Luther College and Exeter Road shopping, restaurants and cafes, plus enjoying great connection to Maroondah Highway, central Croydon, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Eastlink and Eastland, this is flawless family living.

Poised on a generous 1447m2 (approx.) block, this rendered-brick home offers attractive street appeal. Welcomed in by a fresh, modern palette, the combination of polished floorboards and Bamboo floating floors introduce a sense of warmth and individuality.
